  1. Ezra Pound's Haiku Influence (1910s–1920s)
  2. John Gould Fletcher

John Gould Fletcher

An American poet whose works were often infused with Imagist principles, Fletcher captured nature in a succinct and vivid manner, reflecting the influence of Pound on his poetic style.
